name: FetchFunctionVersion
description: Retrieve a specific Function Version resource.

ServiceSid.description: The SID of the Service to fetch the Function Version resource from.

FunctionSid.description: The SID of the function that is the parent of the Function Version resource to fetch.

Sid.description: The SID of the Function Version resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Function Version resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the Function Version resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**function_sid**: The SID of the Function resource that is the parent of the Function Version resource.

**path**: The URL-friendly string by which the Function Version resource can be referenced. It can be a maximum of 255 characters. All paths begin with a forward slash ('/'). If a Function Version creation request is submitted with a path not containing a leading slash, the path will automatically be prepended with one.
**service_sid**: The SID of the Service that the Function Version resource is associated with.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Function Version resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Function Version resource.
